title: "UK in Talks with India on Recognition of Vaccinated Travellers Following Criticism Over New Travel Rules"
excerpt: "The expanded list of countries whose vaccines are recognised in the UK does not include India. It means Indians vaccinated with Covishield, the SII-produced Oxford-AstraZeneca vaccine, would be required to undergo compulsory PCR tests as well as self-isolation."
